website_summaries.verdict: A solid, double-sided option for both touch-ups and total application.
pros: A particularly durable but soft puff, with a convenient built-in finger strap to wear when using
Tear drop shape helps mold to different areas of the face
cons: Somewhat pricey for a single puff

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like how there’s 3 textures, 2 places to hold it, & 2 sponges to use. It really stunk of some weird plastic smell inside & out. A little hard to clean because the sponge sides are so compact that they want to keep the makeup remover or soap inside rather than squeeze out.
customer_reviews.author: WWWF Big

customer_reviews.title: Very nice puff
customer_reviews.text: I really love this puff. It blends my makeup and concealer perfectly. So nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: D. McInerney

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This a great makeup tool. Its the perfect size for travelling and its really soft. Easy to clean ( just soap and water). Holds powder and product really well. Color is vibrant and pretty. The construction is top notch....A bit pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Drewosity

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic powder puff 😍
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST powder puff I have ever had! Great quality, easy to use and easy to clean. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Pass the puff
customer_reviews.text: As much as I like beauty blender, I was not a fan of this. It was awkward to hold and maneuver on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this little powder puff. It presses on powder seamlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Isa

customer_reviews.title: Perefect for setting translucent powder
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my translucent setting powder and it looks flawless!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: nice surprise, works quite well
customer_reviews.text: I like this puff, it feels nice and distributes powder well.
customer_reviews.author: Evie V.

customer_reviews.title: Great for setting powders!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for applying setting powder to the under eye area. Only downfall is that the sponge is heavy! I’ve used a lot of sponges or puffs because I’m a makeup artist, but this one is the heaviest.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Beauty blender Powerpuff
customer_reviews.text: This little velour Puff is a dream to blend setting powders and other stuff with! The quality is outstanding and I am so happy I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Hardcastle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for baking under eyes, or just applying powder evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Buy now!
customer_reviews.text: Best puff I have ever used. Won’t be disappointed. Very luxurious feeling and super comfy to wear/use for myself Or clients. Bought one for my kit and at home. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Love the little powder puff
customer_reviews.text: Love how convenient and versatile it is . Love using it to bake and apply my setting powder
customer_reviews.author: Lisette galdamez

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a nice velour powder puff and was intrigued by this one. The pink side is very soft but doesn't pick up much powder. The tan side is useless - I tried to use it to blend makeup like the package suggested but it just smeared it all over the place. Paying for the name - a regular velour puff would have been much more effective and less expensive. The point does allow you to apply powder into small or tight areas, but that is the only pro I can find.
customer_reviews.author: David Shaughnessy

customer_reviews.title: Does a nice job and I love how it feels.
customer_reviews.text: I love how well it applies my setting powder.. It picks up the powder well too it is only a little messy. But it is not as messy as using a makeup sponge.. plus I don't have to wet it to use it. It puts on an even layer or powder. I will be buying more in the future and will recommend to friends.. I saw this used in Bailey Sarian's YouTube channel.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Great pad! So unique!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is like SO great! It’s perfecting for baking and blending out foundation or concealer under the eyes! It’s the *perfect* shape and the little handle is so nifty. You should purchase one if you’re thinking about it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love love LOVE this lil guy! I saw Bailey Sarian (youtube) using this in her videos and i knew i had to try it. Its perfect for your under eyes and baking! Its easy to use and easy to clean 👍🏻 Cant live without it now!
customer_reviews.author: alexis dicke

customer_reviews.title: My favorite beauty tool
customer_reviews.text: Really soft, easy to clean, compact and good for traveling. My favorite of the Beauty Blender Tools. I use mostly for powder application and it reaches hard to reach areas and leaves a flawless finish.
customer_reviews.author: syddabelle

customer_reviews.title: Returning.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking it would make apply setting powder under the eyes easier. The quality isn’t bad and doesn’t feel cheap. I tried it and the powder went all over the place. Maybe it would work better with a liquid, not sure. I’d rather just use a brush or my beauty blender sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonn

customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product, it is small, hardly adjustable my hand is small
customer_reviews.author: Ana Armijos

customer_reviews.title: Quick Delivery
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived quickly and works pretty good, the only downfall is that it has a funky smell to it and I am not sure I can get over it while using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beauty blender powder puff
customer_reviews.text: Best beauty puff I have. I love this. It applies powder perfectly and evenly, and allows for buffing. It is truly incredible. For sure I recommend this. I will buy some for my sister, my daughter and my friends.
customer_reviews.author: K Adele

product_meta.title: BEAUTYBLENDER POWER POCKET PUFF Dual Sided Powder Puff for Powders and Concealers
feature_bullets: POCKET PUFF: Your grandma’s powder puff just got a makeover. This makeup tool is perfectly sized and shaped so you get a precise application every time. Unlike other round puffs, the teardrop shape offers precision to chisel cheekbones, bake concealer, set makeup and so much more.

SMOOTH: An insanely soft plush pink side contains special fibers that grab and deposit just the right amount of powder. The tan buffed suede side gently re-blends makeup so it looks incredibly smooth and seamless.

DUAL SIDED: The power pocket puff is dual sided and will be your new makeup tool of choice. All you need to do is deposit your powder on the pink side to set your makeup, and reblend and touch up using the tan suede side.
FLAWLESS: To get that professional look rest your fingers on your beautyblender puff during your makeup application to prevent makeup from smudging.
SIZE: This beautyblender Power Pocket Puff is perfect for any makeup lover. Fitting perfectly in your makeup or travel bag you'll always be ready to stand out in a crowd.
